title: Levitt Pavilion Los Angeles
cleaned_text: LEVITT LA 2023 SEASON LINEUP Saturday, June 10 (7-10pm) Season Opening La Banda Arte Productions Presents Boogaloo Assassins, DJ Clifton Weaver aka DJ Soft Touch Salsa / Mambo / Boogaloo / Funk / Soul Friday, June 16 (7-10pm) Latin Alt HD3 Presents Ramona, Mexican Dubwiser, El Bad Buky Romanticas / People's Arkestra, Brian Hargrove, DJ Jazz Sunday, June 18 (5-8pm) Utopia Tribe Presents- Father's Day Celebration Utopia DJ's: KG Superstar + DJ Adé, Katalyst Collective House / Jazz Friday, June 23 (7-10pm) Ánimo Production Presents Boleros de Noche- A Tribute to Mexican Composer Agustín Lara Julian Torres & Marco Antonio Godoy, Trio Casablanca Boleros Saturday, June 24 (6-10pm) Stage of the Arts Inc. Presents 40 Years of Radiotron celebrating 50 years of Hip-Hop King Tee, Kid Frost, Toddy Tee, Tha Union Station MC's, Bgirl Deya Deyas, Beatboxing by Boxy Dee, DJ Rude One, Tha Air Force Crew, Homeland Crew, DJ Juan G, DJ Krye, DJ Gargamel, Big Silenca & Daniel French, Mix Master Dee + more Hip-Hop Sunday, June 25 (5-8pm) Banda Las Angelinas, Los Rock Angels Banda / Friday, 7 (7-10pm) Tolliver, Neyva, Haus of Derma, DJ Javi en Rose Funk / Soul / Drag Saturday, July 8 (7-10pm) Super Estrella Online, La Tocada and The Music Center Present Tropicaliente Amandititita, El Conjunto Nuevo Ola, Pacifico Dance Company AnarCumbia / Cumbia / Mexican Folklorico / Rock Sunday, July 9 (5-8pm) LATV Presents Marilyn Odessa, Los del Momento, Yetzirah Vargas Latin Alternative / Urban Pop Friday, July 14 (7-10pm) Mano y Mano Presents Soulection in the Park Presents [Soulection DJs: Joe Kay, Andre Power, Anastazja](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-la-soulection-in-the-park-presents-soulection-djs-tickets-641858485007?aff=ebdsoporgprofile) Soul Sunday, July 16 (5-8pm) United American Indian Involvement Inc., Presents [Natives in the Now](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-la-united-american-indian-involvement-inc-presents-tickets-641868825937?aff=ebdsoporgprofile) Supaman, Supul Weh, Big Silenca, Hale & Company Native Drummers Contemporary / Traditional Native Friday, July 21 (7-10pm) MezcLA Fest Presents House Issues [E.Dubb, Mayan Passion, K-Bandit](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-la-mezcla-fest-presents-house-issues-tickets-641876388557?aff=ebdsoporgprofile) 80's 90's House / Dance Saturday, July 22 (7-10pm) Levitt National Tour, LACMA & CHIRLA Present [La Santa Cecilia](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-national-tour-lacma-chirla-present-la-santa-cecilia-tickets-642539271257?aff=ebdsoporgprofile) Latin Lopez, Will Echegoyen + more Ancestral / Folklorico / Contemporary Salvadoran Friday, July 28 (7-10pm) Desert Daze Presents [Imarhan, Liberate Elemental Forces, DJ set by Al Lover's World Party](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-la-desert-daze-presents-imarhan-tickets-643268743127?aff=ebdsoporgprofile) Tuareg Desert Rock Saturday, July 29 (7-10pm) Boombox in the Park [Monalisa, Inka One, Mantron, Gaslamp Killer](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-la-boombox-in-the-park-presents-tickets-642411127977?aff=ebdsoporgprofile) Hip-Hop Sunday, July 30 (5-8pm) The Fowler Museum & The NEA Present [Weedie Braimah & the Hands of Time, SK Kakraba](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-la-the-fowler-museum-the-nea-present-tickets-643301631497?aff=ebdsoporgprofile) West African Rhythms But Wicked Presents [DJ Shana Sarett, Healing Gems, De Lux](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-la-pretty-but-wicked-presents-tickets-643347829677?aff=ebdsoporgprofile) Indie Rock / Disco Saturday, August 26 (7-10pm) [Stepping Stone Presents, "The Prettiest Star, Celebrating 50 years of David Bowie's Aladdin Sane" Daniel Crook, Ritchie White Orchestra, Laena, llull (Claire Tolliver, Langosta (Soltera), DJ Mr Glam Rock August 27 (5-8pm) [Dub Club Presents](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-la-dub-club-presents-djs-tom-chasteen-boss-harmony-tickets-643345071427?aff=ebdsoporgprofile)The Delirians + Dj's Tom Chasteen & Boss Harmony Classic Dub / Reggae ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Friday, September 1 (7-10pm) FilAm ARTS Presents [Festival Philippine Arts & Culture (FPAC) ](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-la-filam-arts-presents-festival-of-philippine-arts-culture-fpac-tickets-643524508127?aff=ebdsoporgprofile) Para Sa Lahat (For All) The Mellow Dees, DJ Icy Ice, Introvoys, Jocelyn Enriquez Traditional & Contemporary Philipino Saturday, September 2 (5-9pm) FilAm ARTS Presents [Festival of Philippine Arts & Angeles, Ensemble, Malaya Dance Company Traditional & Contemporary Philipino Sunday, September 3 (5-8pm) Season closing Sunset Ecléctico Presents [Beatriz Solis, Nancy Sanchez y Las Chorizeras, Eisner Intergenerational Orchestra from the Heart of Los Angeles (HOLA) ](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/levitt-la-season-closing-sunset-eclectico-presents-tickets-643526102897?aff=ebdsoporgprofile) Pop / Regional Mexican / Jazz Visit Levitt Pavilion Los Angeles is located in the northwest corner of MacArthur Park, near the intersection of W. 6th Street and S. Park View St., 90057. The park is located just 10 blocks west of downtown Los Angeles and is bordered by Alvarado Street., W. 6th Street, W. 7th Street, S. Park View Street and intersected by Wilshire Blvd. Getting Here [ ](https://www.instagram.com/levitt.la/) levitt.la #MacArthurPark's bilingüe; outdoor music venue celebrating LA's diversity with FREE CONCERTS all Summer long!
